meanings.definition: The act or process of making something thicker.
meanings.sent1: The thickening of the sauce was done by adding flour.
meanings.sent2: I used cornstarch as a thickening for the soup.
meanings.sent3: The thickening of the pudding made it irresistible to the kids.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a thickening of warmth in the room.
meanings.sent5: The thickening of the plot in the movie kept me on the edge of my seat.

meanings.definition: A substance added to a liquid to make it thicker.
meanings.sent1: The recipe called for a thickening like gelatin.
meanings.sent2: She used agar as a thickening for the jam.
meanings.sent3: The thickening in the gravy made it perfect for dipping fries.
meanings.sent4: His lies acted as a thickening to the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The thickening of the paint allowed for better coverage on the canvas.

meanings.sent1: The fog grew thickening as the night went on.
meanings.sent2: The stew became a thickening mixture of flavors.
meanings.sent3: The traffic jam was a thickening situation for commuters.
meanings.sent4: The tension in the room was thickening with each passing minute.
meanings.sent5: The anticipation in the air was thickening as the concert start time approached.
